name: Subsurface: Expedition
description:
1953, Egyptian archaeologists discoverd a giant series of caverns under the desert: the Subsurface. A place not under control of normal physics, filled with mysteries and deadly ruins. Journey down into the caves once again, discover their secrets and try to get out alive in this story focused first person shooter. Stop the untold powers of the Subsurface from falling into the hands of the wrong people.

  • Subsurface: Expedition is a 30-40 minutes story focused experience.
  • Four big levels and many secrets!
  • Exhilarating story with twists and turns. Fully voice acted.
  • A unique world to discover, heavily based off the revolutionary times of Arab nationalism between 1952 - 1967.
  • No cutscenes, no interruptions: the whole story is told during gameplay.
  • Original soundtrack.
